title: Any way to determine where my character is?

comments.author: EnemyCrusher.7324
comments.body: They’re working on doing oauth2 support through the API to allow people to log in. Until then you won’t be able to get any player/account specific data.

comments.author: hellokittyonline.7532
comments.body: so if i’m in lion’s arch anyway api can tell me that?
